name: Zombie Wackers
description:
Zombie Wackers is a game all about killing lots of Zombies with your machine gun. You'll need to scale walls and make a few daring jumps here and there.

The game was created for Ludum Dare 42 and took 25 hours to create. 

Controls
WASD to move, space to jump, CTRL to fire or mouse.
Works with keyboard but Gamepad is recommended.
